snippet: Working with the International Criminal Court could also make Palestinians vulnerable to Israeli counterclaims, experts say.
abstract: Enhanced United Nations status for Palestinians could make way for claims of Israeli war crimes, but option could also make Palestinians vulnerable to Israeli counterclaims.

byline.contributor: Marlise Simons contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Working with the International Criminal Court could also make Palestinians vulnerable to Israeli counterclaims, experts say.

headline.main: New U.N. Status for Palestinians Could Open Door for Claims of Israeli War Crimes
headline.print_headline: New U.N. Status for Palestinians Could Open Door for Claims of Israeli War Crimes

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
